alert.note: Alert for Le Flore (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued January 30 at 12:48PM CST until February 01 at 6:00AM CST by NWS Tulsa
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 AM CST WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Heavy mixed precipitation. Sleet accumulations of up to one half inch and ice accumulations of one tenth to around a quarter of an inch. * WHERE...Le Flore County. * WHEN...Until 6 AM CST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning and evening commute. *ADDITIONAL DETAILS...The higher amounts of ice accumulation are forecast within the higher terrain of southern Le Flore county.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. For the latest road conditions call 1-844-465-4997 or go to okRoads.org.
